data.message: Stop trying to force the message app!!!

replies.message: Hi Stephanie. Messenger is a better messaging experience—with added speed and new features¬ like the groups tab, the ability to make voice calls and easy new ways to take and send photos and videos within the app. Plus, it links seamlessly with the Facebook app to make switching between the two quick and easy! Learn more: http://bit.ly/2fDxEN2. -Jessica

I will never use it. So much for free choices. I barely use the chat as is and now I have an annoying red 1 like there's a message pending when there isn't. You need to listen to your users. I don't care how much better you think it is. I won't be making calls with it nor sending pics or videos. I have a smart phone that already provides these things. Facebook is an app already that shouldn't make me use an additional app for it.
